document.discussion_title: Canaccord Genuity Reaffirms “Buy” Rating for Twitter Inc (TWTR)
document.topic_text: Tweet Twitter Inc (NYSE:TWTR) ‘s stock had its “buy” rating reiterated by analysts at Canaccord Genuity in a research note issued to investors on Monday, MarketBeat reports. Shares of Twitter ( NYSE:TWTR ) traded down 1.6837% on Monday, reaching $16.9399. The company’s stock had a trading volume of 13,080,744 shares. The firm’s 50-day moving average price is $16.99 and its 200-day moving average price is $21.52. Twitter has a 12 month low of $13.91 and a 12 month high of $52.54. The stock’s market cap is $11.54 billion. Twitter (NYSE:TWTR) last announced its quarterly earnings results on Wednesday, February 10th. The social networking company reported $0.16 EPS for the quarter, beating analysts’ consensus estimates of $0.12 by $0.04. The firm had revenue of $710.47 million for the quarter, compared to the consensus estimate of $709.94 million. Twitter’s quarterly revenue was up 48.3% on a year-over-year basis. During the same period in the previous year, the company posted $0.12 earnings per share. On average, analysts forecast that Twitter will post $0.55 earnings per share for the current fiscal year. Other hedge funds and institutional investors recently modified their holdings of the company. Quantitative Systematic Strategies LLC bought a new position in shares of Twitter during the first quarter valued at $1,345,000. Fox Run Management L.L.C. bought a new position in shares of Twitter during the first quarter valued at $265,000. Joel Isaacson & Co. LLC boosted its position in shares of Twitter by 26.5% in the first quarter. Joel Isaacson & Co. LLC now owns 33,377 shares of the social networking company’s stock valued at $552,000 after buying an additional 6,993 shares in the last quarter. Osborne Partners Capital Management LLC boosted its position in shares of Twitter by 7.4% in the first quarter. Osborne Partners Capital Management LLC now owns 157,035 shares of the social networking company’s stock valued at $2,599,000 after buying an additional 10,855 shares in the last quarter. Finally, Gradient Investments LLC boosted its position in shares of Twitter by 19.5% in the first quarter. Gradient Investments LLC now owns 18,694 shares of the social networking company’s stock valued at $309,000 after buying an additional 3,044 shares in the last quarter. Several other equities research analysts have also issued reports on TWTR. SunTrust reaffirmed a “buy” rating and issued a $26.00 price objective (down from $34.00) on shares of Twitter in a research note on Monday, January 25th. Pivotal Research lowered their price objective on Twitter from $43.00 to $34.00 and set a “buy” rating for the company in a research note on Monday, January 25th. Axiom Securities lowered their price objective on Twitter from $36.00 to $33.00 and set a “buy” rating for the company in a research note on Wednesday, January 20th. Standpoint Research began coverage on Twitter in a research note on Wednesday, January 20th. They issued a “buy” rating and a $24.00 price objective for the company. Finally, JPMorgan Chase & Co. reaffirmed a “buy” rating on shares of Twitter in a research note on Saturday, January 16th. Four research analysts have rated the stock with a sell rating, twenty-six have assigned a hold rating, sixteen have assigned a buy rating and two have given a strong buy rating to the company’s stock. The company presently has an average rating of “Hold” and a consensus price target of $25.95. In other news, CTO Adam Messinger sold 14,799 shares of the business’s stock in a transaction that occurred on Friday, April 1st. The stock was sold at an average price of $15.97, for a total transaction of $236,340.03. Following the transaction, the chief technology officer now directly owns 1,479,800 shares in the company, valued at approximately $23,632,406. The sale was disclosed in a legal filing with the SEC, which is available at the SEC website . Also, Chairman Omid Kordestani bought 122,250 shares of the stock in a transaction dated Tuesday, February 16th. The shares were bought at an average price of $16.34 per share, for a total transaction of $1,997,565.00. The disclosure for this purchase can be found here . Twitter, Inc ( NYSE:TWTR ) is a global platform for public self-expression and conversation in real time. The Company offers products and services for users, advertisers, developers and platform and data partners. Products and services for users enables a way for people to create, distribute and discover content, which enables a user on Twitter to create a tweet and a user to follow other users. //www.americanbankingnews.com/2016/04/25/canaccord-genuity-reaffirms-buy-rating-for-twitter-inc-twtr/ Twitter Inc Twitter Inc
